definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: bad, evil (distinction from n., and vb. Pf. 3 ms., is sts. not easy, and opinions differ);—ms. [[רַע]] Ge 6:5 +; [[רָָע]] Ge 31:24 +; pl. [[רָעַים]] Ge 13:13 +; cstr. [[רָעֵי]] Ez Eze 7:24 (del. Co); fs. [[רָעָה]] Ge 37:2 + 37 t. (this form usu. noun), pl. [[רָעוֹת]] Ge 28:8 + 14 t.; [[רָעׂת]] Ge 41:27 (18 t. noun);—†

bad, disagreeable, malignant: of a woman, [[רָעָה בְּעֵינֵי]] Ex 21:8 (E; perhaps, with changed accent, vb. 3 fs. [[רָ֫עָה]]) disagreeable, unpleasing in the eyes of, pl. Ge 28:8 (P); of poisonous herb 2Ki 4:41, malignant boils De 28:35, Job 2:7, diseases De 7:15, De 28:59, 2Ch 21:19, Ec 6:2, deadly sword Ps 144:10, arrows Ez Eze 5:16, severe judgments Eze 14:21, wonders De 6:22; [[מַלְאֲכֵי רָעִים]] Ps 78:49 = fierce messengers (of God; EW:§ 287 a Ges:§ 130 e), wild beasts Ge 37:20, Ge 37:33 (JE) Le 26:6 (H) Ez Eze 5:17, Eze 14:15, Eze 14:21, Eze 34:25; unclean thing De 23:10. †

bad, unpleasant, giving pain, unhappiness, misery: [[ימים רעים]] evil days (of trial and hardship) Ge 47:9 (P) Pr 15:15; [[עִנְיׇן רע]] Ec 1:13, Ec 5:13; [[עִנְיַן]] Ec 4:8, cf. Ec 2:17, Ec 9:3; [[הַמַּעֲשֶׂה הָרָע]] Ec 4:3; [[הדבר הרע]] evil report Ex 33:4 (J), so [[דִּבָּה רָעָה]] Ge 37:2 (JE) Nu 14:37 (P), [[שׁם רע]] De 22:14, De 22:19, Ne 6:13, [[שְׁמוּעָה רָעָה]] Je 49:23, Ps 112:7; of things: painful discipline Pr 15:10, evil occurrence 1Ki 5:18, evil (-bringing) net Ec 9:12, instruments Is 32:7: [[כל הדבר הרע]] Jos 23:15 (D) all evil (injurious) things; [[רַע]] it is bad, harmful Is 3:11, Je 2:19; of speech, [[דבּר]], [[רעאו טוב]] Ge 24:50 (J) in prov., speak bad or good = anything at all, [[מטוב עד רע]] Ge 31:24, Ge 31:29 (E), [[לְמֵרָע ועד טוב]] 2Sa 13:22, of the divine spirit as producing an ecstatic state of frenzy and violence 1Sa 16:14, 1Sa 16:15, 1Sa 16:16, 1Sa 16:23, 1Sa 18:10, 1Sa 19:9 (see [[רוּח]]
evil, displeasing [[עָשָׂח êָרע בְּעֵינֵי סַרְנֵי פְלשְׁתִּים]] 1Sa 29:7. †

bad of its kind, land Nu 13:19 (J), place Nu 20:5 (JE), waters 2Ki 2:19, figs Je 24:2, Je 24:3, Je 24:3, Je 24:8, kine Ge 41:3, Ge 41:4, Ge 41:19, Ge 41:20, Ge 41:21, Ge 41:27 (E), [[מוּם רע]] De 15:21, cf. De 17:1. †
bad, i.e. of low value Le 27:10, Le 27:10, Le 27:12, Le 27:14, Le 27:33 (H), cf. Mal 1:8, Mal 1:8; [[רַע רַע יאׁמַר מַקּוֹנֶמ]] Pr 20:14, Pr 20:14. †
+ [[מִן]] comp., worse than, 2Sa 19:8; as superl., [[רָעֵי]] [[גוֹיִם]] Ez Eze 7:24 worst of nations (del. Co). †
sad, unhappy: [[לֶב־רָעָ]] sad heart (cf. opp. [[טוב]], [[יטב]]) Pr 25:20; of face Ge 40:7 (E) Ne 2:2; [[רע לְפָנׇיו]] v:Ne 2:1. †
[[רָעָה]]([[ה]])[[חָשַׁב מַחֲשֶׁבֶת]] devise evil(hurtful) device Ez Eze 38:10, Es 9:25. †
bad, unkind, vicious in disposition or temper: [[וְלֵב־רָָע]] when the mind is vicious, harmful Pr 26:23; [[רַע עָָיִן]] one evil of eye Pr 23:6, Pr 28:22; [[רוּחַ רָעָה]] Ju Jdg 9:23 bad temper.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in gen., [[אם טוב ואם רע]] Ec 12:14 whether good or bad. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of persons, [[אושׁ רע]] 1Sa 30:22; [[אדם רע]] Ps 140:2; [[המן הרע הזה]] Es 7:6 this wicked Haman, so [[רָָע]] = evil man Ps 10:15, Job 21:30, Pr 11:21, Pr 12:13, Pr 24:20, [[רָעִים]] = evil men Ge 13:13 (J) Je 6:29, Je 15:21, Ez Eze 30:12, Job 35:12, Pr 4:14, Pr 12:12, Pr 14:19, Pr 15:8; [[רָעוֹת]] evil women Je 2:33; [[שׁכנים רעים]] Je 12:14 evil neighbours; of [[הַדּוֹר]] De 1:35, [[הָעָם]] Je 13:10; [[הָעֵדָה]] Nu 14:27, Nu 14:35 (P), [[המשׁפחה]] Je 8:3; ´[[רַע בְּעֵינֵי י]]: wicked in the eyes of ´[[י]]: Ge 38:7 (JE) = 1Ch 2:8; ´[[עָשָׂה הָרָע בְּעֵינֵי י]]: Nu 32:13 (R) De 4:25, De 9:18, De 17:2, De 31:29, Ju Jdg 2:11 + 48 t., + (c. sf. of God) 2Ki 21:15, Is 65:12, Is 66:4, Je 7:30, Je 32:30, Ps 51:6, 2Sa 12:9, prob. also Je 18:10 (read [[הָרָע]] for [[הָרָעָה]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of thoughts, [[יֵחֶר]] Ge 6:5, Ge 8:21 (J), [[הַלֵּב הָרָע]] Je 3:17, Je 7:24, Je 11:8, Je 16:12, Je 18:12; words, [[רעות]] Pr 15:28.
); [[בֶּחַע רע]] Hb Hab 2:9; [[מרוחתם]] Je 23:10; [[רעות]]([[ה]])[[תועבות ]]([[ה]]) Ez Eze 6:11, Eze 8:9 (del. Co); [[כִּי רָעוֹת בִּמְגוּרָם]] Ps 55:16 for evil deeds are in their dwelling.
